sourcesContent:
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCircleArrowLeft, faCircleArrowRight, faCircleXmark, faLocationDot, } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import React, { useState , useContext} from 'react' import Header from '../../components/header/Header' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import './hotel.css' import MailList from '../../components/mailList/MailList' import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer' import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchContext } from '../../context/SearchContext' const Hotel = () => { const location = useLocation() const id = location.pathname.split('/')[2] const [slideNumber, setSlideNumber] = useState(0) const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const { data, loading, error, reFetch } = useFetch( `http://localhost:8800/api/hotels/find/${id}` ) const { dates } = useContext(SearchContext) const MILLISECONDS_PER_DAY = 1000*60*60*24; const handleOpen = (i) => { setSlideNumber(i) setOpen(true) } const handleMove = (direction) => { let newSlideNumber if (direction === 'l') { newSlideNumber = slideNumber === 0 ? 5 : slideNumber - 1 } else { newSlideNumber = slideNumber === 5 ? 0 : slideNumber + 1 } setSlideNumber(newSlideNumber) } return (
{loading ? ( 'loading' ) : (
{open && (
setOpen(false)} /> handleMove('l')} className="arrow" />
handleMove('r')} className="arrow" />
)}

{data.name}

{data.address}
Excellent location - {data.distance}m from center Book a stay over ${data.cheapestPrice} at this property and get a free airport taxi
{data.photos?.map((photo, i) => (
handleOpen(i)} src={photo} alt="" className="hotelImg" />
))}

{data.title}

{data.desc}

Perfect for a 9-night stay!

Located in the real heart of Krakow, this property has an excellent location score of 9.8!

$945 (9 nights)

)}
) } export default Hotel
